pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, July 3, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, July 3, 2016:

Toronto, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend Church on Church.

Pride South Stage
Corner Church Street & Wood Street (South East corner)
Toronto, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Toronto Pride Parade.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
